import { ChevronDownIcon, FunnelIcon, MinusIcon, PlusIcon, Squares2X2Icon, } from "@heroicons/react/20/solid"; const sortOptions = [ { name: "Most Popular", href: "#", current: true }, { name: "Best Rating", href: "#", current: false }, { name: "Newest", href: "#", current: false }, { name: "Price: Low to High", href: "#", current: false }, { name: "Price: High to Low", href: "#", current: false }, ];
